resources.string: Persist accounts with Room and remember sessions with SharedPreferences
Usernames and passwords are stored in the Room database. Enable "Remember me" to save the most recent login in SharedPreferences.

• Room: Stores multiple local accounts for offline login and quick queries\n• SharedPreferences: Caches the most recent user, last login time, and remember-me state\n• Use the button below to quickly clear SharedPreferences and reset the login state
Account saved; you can log in now
Account already exists; switched to login for you
Enter a username and a password with at least 4 characters
First time here? Please register an account.
